Design for the Grand Staircase at the Royal Palace of Caserta, Italy

label: Description
value: Section and half of the lowest flight of the stair shown in bird's eye view. The plan is an ovoid. Over the top flight are windows separated by groups of pilasters and columns. Over the entablature are windows in half-circles, at the bottom of a dome. Trophies of arms and girls' heads with festoons, respectively, decorate panels. Framing stripe. Verso, horizontally: The beginning of the right half is shown. Arched doorway corresponding to the ground and mezzanine floors. A loggia is in the floor. Pedestals before the wall panel are intended to carry statues. One order of the pilasters is shown in the top part, each bay containing a window of the third and fourth floors. A loggia is in the center, its framing architrave being built in a niche, the conch of which is visible over it. At bottom: two scales.

label: Physical description

Sepulcher in Egyptian Style with Caryatids and a Lion

label: Description
value: A drawing of a tomb with a sarcophagus placed before a niche with a shallow arched ceiling.  The headstone of the sarcophagius is flanked by 2 caryatids and bears hieroglyphic inscriptions and burning lamp.  A dead body is outstretched on bed of sarcophagus, which rests on four supports surrounding a recumbent lion.

Sepulcher with Death Seated and Crowned

label: Description

Sepulcher in Egyptian Style with Death Carrying a Lamp

label: Description
value: Architectural fantasy.  A drawing of a tomb with a sarcophagus in a rounded-arch niche.  A robed figure of Death stands before the sarcophagus holding a smoking lamp. The tomb is flanked by 2 recumbent lions carved in stone.

Sepulcher in Egyptian Style with Sphinxes and an Owl

label: Description
value: Architectural fantasy.  Pentagonal sarcophagus, supported on the backs of sculpted sphinxes, is housed in a rounded arch niche.  A small niche in the left of the arch contains an urn.  Two unshod feet appear in an arched opening of the sarcophagus, which is ornamented with hieroglyphs and a carved owl perched on top.
